mapper.select: select productNum, productName, price, p.p_categoryNum, p.companyNum, productImage, pc.p_categoryName, c.companyName from product p, company c, product_category pc where p.p_categoryNum = pc.p_categoryNum and p.companyNum = c.companyNum
mapper.insert: insert into product (productNum, companyNum, p_categoryNum, productName, description, price, amount, productImage) values (seq_product.nextval, #{companyNum}, #{p_categoryNum}, #{productName}, #{description}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{productImage})
mapper.update: udpate product set productName = #{productName}, price = #{price}, description = #{description}, amount = #{amount}, productImage = #{productImage}, where productNum = #{productNum}
